title.narrative: Enhancing Disaster Preparedness and capacity for initial rapid response - Ituri

description.narrative: This project falls under the NCO3( National Change Objective). It is linked to the OI preparedness and response plan and coherent with the HECA vision 2010. Contributing to reduce the impact of humanitarian disasters on up to 740 000 affected people in Ituri Province, this project will increase the effectiveness and timeliness of Oxfam's responses to humanitarian emergencies in DRC by establishment of an effectively managed and appropriate contingency stock, and setting up an Oxfam Emergency Response Team. Activities associate also the salary costs of the Humanitarian Programme manager post and core staff.
